description: This file is a Flutter application's main source file defining the entry point, main widget, and home page with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget serving as the main screen with a loading message.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, building the UI with app bar and loading indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState widgets, constructing the widget tree.
